1.0.name: wordpress/spreaker-shortcode
1.0.description:
With this shortcode you can easily embed spreaker.com podcasts in your wordpress blog.

Simple as [spreaker show_id=] or [spreaker episode_id=].

Further configuration

  • type (player dimension: standard or mini. default mini)
  • color (player color: in hexadecimal format. i.e. color=#ff0000)
  • autoplay (whether or not the player should start play upon loading: true or false. default: false)
  • width (player width: px or percent)
  • debug (print debug information. useful if the player seems to render differently from the settings. default: false)

If you have any issues please refer to the support forum
